title: Google\Cloud\BaremetalSolution\V2\Lun
name: Lun
description:
A storage volume logical unit number (LUN).

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.baremetalsolution.v2.Lun

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Output only. The name of the LUN.

params.name: data.size_gb
params.description: The size of this LUN, in gigabytes.

params.name: data.multiprotocol_type
params.description: The LUN multiprotocol type ensures the characteristics of the LUN are optimized for each operating system.

params.name: data.storage_volume
params.description: Display the storage volume for this LUN.

params.name: data.shareable
params.description: Display if this LUN can be shared between multiple physical servers.

params.name: data.boot_lun
params.description: Display if this LUN is a boot LUN.
